SEARCH
Package ca.jolt.routing.context

Class QueryContextValue

java.lang.Object
ca.jolt.routing.context.JoltHttpContextValue
ca.jolt.routing.context.QueryContextValue
public final class QueryContextValue extends JoltHttpContextValue
A specialized JoltHttpContextValue for query parameters. Provides convenience methods to handle default values and type conversions (e.g., int, double) safely.

Example usage: 


 int page = ctx.query("page").asIntOrDefault(1);
Since:
1.0
Author:
William Beaudin
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • QueryContextValue

      public QueryContextValue(String value)
      Constructs a new QueryContextValue, wrapping the given string.
      Parameters:
      value - A query parameter value, potentially null.

  • Method Details

    • orDefault

      public String orDefault(String defaultValue)
      Returns the wrapped string value or a specified default if not present.
      Parameters:
      defaultValue - The fallback value if this query parameter is absent.
      Returns:
      The parameter value or the default value.

    • orDefaultIf

      public String orDefaultIf(Predicate<String> condition, String defaultValue)
      Returns the wrapped string value if present; otherwise checks a condition against the default value. If the condition is satisfied, returns the default value; otherwise returns null.
      Parameters:
      condition - A predicate tested against the default value.
      defaultValue - The fallback value if the parameter is not present.
      Returns:
      The parameter value if present, or the default value if the parameter is missing and the predicate returns true.

    • asIntOrDefault

      public int asIntOrDefault(int defaultValue)
      Parses the parameter as an integer, or returns the specified default if the value is absent or not a valid integer.
      Parameters:
      defaultValue - The fallback integer.
      Returns:
      The parsed integer or the default.

    • asDoubleOrDefault

      public double asDoubleOrDefault(double defaultValue)
      Parses the parameter as a double, or returns the specified default if the value is absent or not a valid double.
      Parameters:
      defaultValue - The fallback double.
      Returns:
      The parsed double or the default.

    • asBooleanOrDefault

      public boolean asBooleanOrDefault(boolean defaultValue)
      Parses the parameter as a boolean, or returns the specified default if the value is absent.

      The method uses Boolean.parseBoolean(String) which returns true if the trimmed value is equal to "true" (ignoring case), and false otherwise.

      Parameters:
      defaultValue - The fallback boolean.
      Returns:
      The parsed boolean or the default.
